8 Tips : Contents of a #startup Business Plan

Your business plan is your roadmap. It should include:

1️⃣Business background
2️⃣Mission statement
3️⃣Service or product descriptions
4️⃣Human resources plans
5️⃣Operational plans
6️⃣Financial plans
7️⃣Marketing plans
8️⃣Technological plans
